籤詩版本二:
I-jade eyigugu namagugu afihlwe etsheni afunwa kuphela abantu bangaphandle abavela kwezinye izindawo.
Njengokuphatha isibani ufuna umlilo, kungcono ukuhlanza umzamo olahlekile
詩意:
Le hexagram iphethe isibani futhi ibheka uphawu lomlilo.
Konke kuzofezeka ngesikhathi esifanele.
解曰: Umhlangano womshado. Akukho okungenziwa. Kumelwe kungabi namkhawulo. Kuyiqiniso phambi kwamehlo ami.
籤詩故事一:
◇UPang Juan ubuka ukwakheka
Ngenkathi Yezizwe Ezilwayo, uSun Bin wayengowokuzalwa eQi. UPang Juan wayengowokuzalwa e-Wei. Wayephinde akhonze uGu Guzi njengothisha wakhe.
U-Sun Bin wafunda kangcono kunoPang Juan, futhi uPang Juan waba ujenene we-Wei. Walwa noSun Bin empini yobuhlakani, kwathi lapho ehluliwe, wazonda uSun Bin.
Wasebenzisa iqhinga lokunquma izinyawo zikaSun Bin, kamuva uSun Bin wazenza umuntu ohlanya wakwazi ukubaleka.
Inkosi u-Wei yaseQi yasebenzisa u-Sun Bin njengomeluleki wakhe wezempi ukuze ahole amasosha ayohlasela u-Wei.
UPang Juan waya ekamu lika-Sun Bin ukuze ahlole ukwakheka kwezempi. U-Sun Bin ukhohlise uPang Juan ngokwenza sengathi unciphisa amasosha akhe futhi wengeza amasosha ngasese. UPang Juan wamjaha waze wafika kuMaling Road wadutshulwa wabulawa isosha elalimqamekele ngomnsalo.
(Isingathekiso sale ndaba siwukuthi nawe unekhono, pho kungani kufanele ube nomona ngethalente lakhe?)
聖意: Umuzi awuziphathi kahle, kunzima ukuthola imali, kunzima ukuhwebelana, kunzima ukuganwa, kunzima kumuntu wesifazane ohambahambayo ukuhambisa amasimu, izimpethu, Qiuji, nemfuyo eyisithupha, kunzima ukuthola umuntu, ukutholakala, ukumangalelwa, ukuthuthela endlini endala, ukulahleka, ukugula, ukungcwatshwa ethuneni lasentabeni.
